## Netgrep class

The `netgrep` library allows to search remote files for a specific pattern using the `ripgrep` library over HTTP.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Netgrep 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(config)](./netgrep.netgrep._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Netgrep</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [search(url, pattern, metadata, config)](./netgrep.netgrep.search.md) |  | Search a remote file for a specific pattern. This method uses <code>ripgrep</code> under the hood in order to start searching while downloading the file instead of waiting for the whole file to be available offline. |
|  [searchBatch(inputs, pattern, config)](./netgrep.netgrep.searchbatch.md) |  | Execute the <code>search</code> method in batch for multiple files. This method returns a promise waiting for all the executed searches to complete. |
|  [searchBatchWithCallback(inputs, pattern, cb, config)](./netgrep.netgrep.searchbatchwithcallback.md) |  | Execute the <code>search</code> method in batch for multiple files. This method takes a callback as an input and executes it everytime a match happens. |
